text: [Music]
companies are quickly moving to the
cloud to become more agile and
dramatically lower their costs however
due to low latency or local data
processing requirements some workloads
need to remain on premises what if
developers can use the same api's and
services that they use in the cloud to
also develop applications that remain on
premises and similarly what if IT can
use the same tools to provision manage
and operate IT resources across
on-premises and cloud AWS outposts make
it possible by bringing fully managed
native AWS services infrastructure and
operating models to virtually any data
center colocation space or on-premises
facility AWS outposts provide the same
hardware and software infrastructure and
a consistent set of api's services and
tools across your AWS cloud and
on-premises environments for a truly
consistent hybrid experience enabling
companies to develop once and deploy in
the AWS cloud or on-premises without
having to rewrite or recertify their
applications outposts are fully managed
and supported by AWS you do not have to
worry about updating or patching
infrastructure outposts allow you to
choose from a wide selection of compute
memory and storage options based on your
needs and it's hardware can be easily
serviced and updated when required to
provide a future-proof infrastructure
model to run all your applications AWS
outposts sign up to learn more
